adDetails: APPLE MAC COMPUTER SPECIALIST & CONSULTANT show contact info Competitive Rates! We Come To You! Expert, Honest, Efficient and Friendly Service! SUPPORT FOR ALL MODELS OF APPLE / MAC COMPUTERS, INCLUDING: * Mac Pro, MacBook Pro, Macbook Air, iMac, Mac Mini, PowerMac, eMac, PowerBook, iBook; Power PC, G3, G4, G5, Intel Core Duo / i3 / i5 / i7 / Zeon / Dual / Quad / 8 Core processors! APPLE SERVICES INCLUDE: * Computer System Setup & Installation. * Hardware & Software Management. * Peripherals: Apple TV, Cinema Displays, Printers, Scanners, Digital Cameras, * Mobile Devices: iPhones, iPods, iPads, etc. * Internet Connection: FIOS, Cable, DSL, Wi-Fi, Airport Extreme/Express, D-Link, Linksys, Netgear, etc. * Email Setup: Apple Mail, Entourage, Outlook, AOL, Gmail, Yahoo, Hotmail; Import email / contacts / calender from a PC. * Sync Apple Mail / iCal / Address Book with all devices (desktop, laptop, iPhone, iPad, Mobile Me, iCloud), etc. * Network Installation & Configuration: Wired & Wireless, Servers / Modems / Routers / Hubs / Switches, Printer & File Sharing, etc. * Hardware Upgrades: Ram Memory, Hard-Drives, CD/DVD Drives, Audio & Video cards, etc.. * Operating System Upgrades: OS 9 (Classic); OS X: OSX 10.2 (Jaguar), OSX 10.3 (Panther), OSX 10.4 (Tiger), OSX 10.5 (Leopard), OSX 10.6 (Snow Leopard), OSX 10.7 (Lion), OSX 10.8 (Mountain Lion) & OSX 10.9 (Mavericks)! * iOS Mobile Operating System Upgrades - Up to iOS 7! * Music Studios & Musicians - DAW Setup & Installation: Logic Pro, Pro Tools, etc. * Audio & Video Digitization - Convert Analog Cassettes & VHS to Digital. * Transfer & Back Up Data, Automated Backups, Time Machine & Time Capsule Setup, etc. * Upgrade to a new Mac, or Move from PC to Mac. * On-site Training & Tutorials. SERVICE AREAS INCLUDE: * SANTA CRUZ / MONTEREY (and Surrounding Areas): Santa Cruz, Soquel, Capitola, Aptos, Ben Lomond, Boulder Creek, Scotts Valley, Watsonville, Davenport, Carmel, Monterey, etc. * SOUTH BAY / SAN JOSE (and Surrounding Areas): Campbell, Cupertino, Los Gatos, Saratoga, San Jose, Santa Clara, Mountain View, Sunnyvale, Cambrian, Willow Glen, Morgan Hill, Gilroy, etc. How can we help you? Please email or call show contact info for rates.
